amendment.description: Amendment reduces funding for Salaries and Expenses, General Administration of the Department of Justice by $1,044,445 and increases funding for Salaries and Expenses, United States Attorneys by $1 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for Salaries and Expenses, General Administration of the Department of Justice by $1,044,445 and to increase funding for Salaries and Expenses, United States Attorneys by $1 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Coffman amendment (A023) Agreed to by voice vote.
